value:
You have assembled a fine group of
Heroes from across many realms...
Their strength blazes brilliantly!$k$pThis stirs the fighting spirit deep
within me!

Man is fated to fight endless wars...
By my own right, I walk the path of
the conqueror!$k$pMan alone is the ruler of his domain!

If you see yourself as a leader, don't
scuttle about currying favor with
everyone! Carry yourself with pride.

Those who stalk the battlefield must
take the utmost care to maintain a
strong heart and a robust body.$k$pIn other words, you have to eat your
vegetables!

I never shirk my training. Every day, I
put in the effort. To become satisfied
by your progress is to become weak.

I am Walhart! I stand strong, an ally
of $Nf!

The path to my conquest is
illuminated by the divine!

I am driven to seek ultimate
power, and I am not satisfied!
Hmph. A paltry gain.

This is it, the power to rule! Siding
with you brings me strength.

I am Walhart, the conqueror of men
and he who brought glory to the
great land of Valm!

You deserve praise for your
strategies. They have led to many
successes in battle...$k$pBut you lack something crucial.$k$pAsk yourself this: Am I merely a
spectator and not a participant? It is
as if the battle does not reach you!$k$pSummoned to another world, yet you
treat the struggles unfolding before
you as an exercise in theory!$k$pThis cannot stand.$k$pYou must think of yourself as a Hero!
The battle rages within your heart!$k$pVictory is decided by the strongest of
wills. The will to rule over people, to
surpass even the gods...$k$pYour will must be unbending if you
would grasp victory.$k$pYou have yet to mature, but talent
does lie within you.$k$pI will follow you into battle and see
how you develop. I trust you have
no objections!
ふん！
ぬるいわ！
うああっ！
ぬう…！
You shall fall by the wayside!
I am greater than the gods!
Amusing!
How do you like the taste?
My conquest ends here...
*laugh*
I am Walhart the Conqueror! None will stand in the way of my conquest.
Are you trying to provoke me? You have guts. I like that.
If you would call on my power, prepare yourself. I will only submit to the strong.
A conqueror rules by strength alone. Defeat is death. I will not be defeated!
Treading the path of kings, ruling by winning hearts... That is not my way. I rule by winning battles.
I was driven off the path to conquest, and only blood will see me returned to it. One man's blood...
Do not waste my time with questions you know the answers to.
Very well.
Lead or be led!
I am the Conqueror!
